Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the Controller in MVC design pattern. The whole application, in fact, is based on MVC pattern, and in particular Game Controller is called whenever a GameControllerHandleable message is received. It handles initial choices done by players before starting the first turn. Messages related to an action performed in a Turn are forwarded to TurnController.

  • Method Details

    • getTurnController

      public TurnController getTurnController()

    • getModel

      public Game getModel()

    • handleResourceChoiceMessage

      public void handleResourceChoiceMessage​(ResourceChoiceMessage message, RemoteView sender)
      Handles a resource choice message and updates number of processed messages. Notifies remote view if any error has been detected before performing action.
      Parameters:
      message - message to be handled.
      sender - remote view that has forwarded the message.

    • handleLeaderChoiceMessage

      public void handleLeaderChoiceMessage​(LeaderChoiceMessage message, RemoteView sender)
      Handles an initial leader cards choice. It takes into account of how many messages has been correctly processed because messages are received asynchronously in the sense that a player can choose leaders while another one is choosing his resources, in this way it's possible to detect if all choices have been made before starting the first turn.
      Parameters:
      message - message to be handled.
      sender - remote view that has forwarded the message.

    • handlePlayerReconnection

      public void handlePlayerReconnection​(User reconnectingUser)
      Handles an user reconnection.
      Parameters:
      reconnectingUser - user that is reconnecting.

    • handlePlayerDisconnection

      public void handlePlayerDisconnection​(User disconnectingUser, NetworkRemoteView remoteView)
      Handles an user disconnection. If this event happens before that leaders choice is done by disconnected user, game controller makes an autonomous decision about which leader cards have to be discarded. In case of disconnection during a game turn further decisions are handled by turn controller. If who has just disconnected was the last playing user, it starts a timer that after its deadline will delete the game.
      Parameters:
      disconnectingUser - user that lost connection.
      remoteView - remote view of user that lost connection.

    • checkAllLeaderChoicesDone

      private boolean checkAllLeaderChoicesDone​(java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger leaderChoicesDone)

    • checkAllChoicesDone

      private boolean checkAllChoicesDone​(java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger resourceChoiceDone)

    • startFirstTurn

      private void startFirstTurn()
      Method that handles decisions about starting the first turn, that can be done only if all the players have chosen leader cards and for those who are able to, resources.

    • checkPlayerResourceChoice

      private boolean checkPlayerResourceChoice​(ResourceChoiceMessage message, Player sender)
      Boolean method that checks if a resource choice is legal given player position.
      Parameters:
      message - message containing chosen resources.
      sender - player that made resource choice.

    • isValidFourthPlayerPositioning

      public boolean isValidFourthPlayerPositioning​(java.util.List<Pair<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer>> resourceDestination)
      Method to check if the fourth player in a game has correctly chosen destination for his resources. Since only the fourth player has the possibility to choose two resources, he is also the only one that can make errors choosing them, so this control is necessary to avoid any errors.

    • hasNotDoneResourceChoice

      private boolean hasNotDoneResourceChoice​(User disconnectingUser)
      Boolean that performs a player warehouse inspection and checks if a player has done his resources choice before losing the connection.
      Parameters:
      disconnectingUser - user that lost connection during initial choices phase of the game.
